contents:
2018年就有了，看视频

那个叫sads 和2019ncov不同种。。2019ncov和sars是同种 不然ncbi一搜不就有了 那直接全世界学生物的都知道了
我贴下相关链接
https://www.nih.gov/news-events/news-releases/new-coronavirus-emerges-bats-china-devastates-young-swine

The new virus is named swine acute diarrhea syndrome coronavirus (SADS-CoV). It does not appear to infect people, unlike SARS-CoV which infected more than 8,000 people and killed 774.
The work was a collaboration among scientists from EcoHealth Alliance, Duke-NUS Medical School, Wuhan Institute of Virology and other organizations, and was funded by the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, part of the National Institutes of Health

武汉病毒所和美国其他机构例如duke医学院还有nih合作的。。。
